Key Match Events: Vangelis Pavlidis scored a late winner for Greece in the 94th minute
Jude Bellingham scored a late equalizer for England in the 87th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Lee Carsley took a knock in the third match of his interim tenure
The result marks England's first competitive loss at Wembley in four years, and their first ever defeat to Greece
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Wembley
Others: England set up with an experimental starting XI
Carsley went with an XI that did not play a recognized forward despite having Ollie Watkins and Dominic Solanke in reserve
